title: Looking to join a Ranked Team
body:
I'm Gold 4 and struggling to choose which role to main in Solo Q. I'm looking for a team so that I will be able to focus on learning one role without feeling like I'm giving up on others. I play 7-14 hours a day so please feel free to add me. 
Note: I'm not setting one up I want to be on someone else's.

replies.body:
Hi there, If you are playing jungle, we'd love you to be a new addition to our team, I'm currently looking to build a strong team to go up the ranked 5 ladders. If you want to give it a shot and you play jungle to a decent level, feel free to add me and we'll talk about.
IGN: Junior
Here's the forum post in case.
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/VWpQduJa-looking-to-build-a-serious-silver-team-from-the-ground-up-mid-taken
